description:
Refuto hires Rinne to protect an offering of delicious dumplings. Later, Rinne looks forward to a Saury Festival... with one hidden condition.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Head Man / When You Wish Upon the Moon / The First Saury Festival
Kubi Otoko / Tsuki ni Negai o / Daiikkai Sanma Matsuri
L`homme-tête – Un souhait à la lune – Le premier festival du balaou
首男 / 月に願いを / 第一回サンマ祭り
